blogPost.excerpt: Rent the Backyard builds backyard homes for people to house their family, use as a home office or rent for extra income. The process is as fast as 12 weeks, (2 weeks in your backyard). Eco-friendly tech & software lets us build up to 40% cheaper & 2x as fast.
blogPost.body: Rent the Backyard builds backyard homes for people to house their family, use as a home office or rent for extra income. The process is as fast as 12 weeks, (2 weeks in your backyard). Eco-friendly tech & software lets us build up to 40% cheaper & 2x as fast.
blogPost.title: Rent the Backyard - Add a backyard home to rent, host your family, or work from
blogPost.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: 租后院为人们建造后院房屋，用于安置家人，作为家庭办公室或出租以获得额外收入。这个过程快至12周，（2周在您的后院）。环保的技术和软件让我们的建造成本降低40%，速度提高2倍。
localize.tagline: 增加一个后院的房子出租，接待你的家人，或从工作。

localize.description: 租後院爲人們建造後院房屋，用於安置家人，作爲家庭辦公室或出租以獲得額外收入。這個過程快至12周，（2周在您的後院）。環保的技術和軟件讓我們的建造成本降低40%，速度提高2倍。
localize.tagline: 增加一個後院的房子出租，接待你的家人，或從工作。

previous.excerpt: We've built Seek a Guru to promote the positive sides of the Internet, that is connecting disciples with gurus virtually to enhance lives, knowledge and experience. Seek a Guru is a platform that will automate bookings, payments, security and integration.
previous.title: Seek a Guru - Monetize your knowledge through mentoring

localize.description: 我们建立了Seek a Guru来促进互联网的积极面，那就是把弟子和大师虚拟地连接起来，以提升生活、知识和经验。Seek a Guru是一个平台，它将自动化预订、支付、安全和整合。
localize.tagline: 通过指导使您的知识货币化

localize.description: 我們建立了Seek a Guru來促進互聯網的積極面，那就是把弟子和大師虛擬地連接起來，以提升生活、知識和經驗。Seek a Guru是一個平臺，它將自動化預訂、支付、安全和整合。
localize.tagline: 通過指導使您的知識貨幣化

next.excerpt: Per Diem makes it easy for local businesses to sell subscriptions online, and gives them all the tools they need to build their own Amazon Prime.
next.title: Per Diem - Subscriptions for local businesses

localize.description: Per Diem使本地企业可以轻松地在线销售订阅，并为他们提供建立自己的Amazon Prime所需的所有工具。
Per Diem使本地企業可以輕鬆地在線銷售訂閱，併爲他們提供建立自己的Amazon Prime所需的所有工具。
